main event: An object larger than any star, with red lights, hovered briefly over St. Louis, Missouri on 21 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed using ground-radar,The object did not disappear during the sighting,An ASTRO PLOT indicated the object was in a known location at the time of sighting,The sighting occurred on a cloudy night with very little traffic,There are multiple records from Project Blue Book regarding different sightings in St. Louis around the same time.
sighted object: an object larger than any star with red lights
